name: Dolphin Hydrorush
description:
Dolphin Hydrorush is a fast paced 2d platformer game about a dolphin speeding his way on land using ponds and puddles to hydrorush and defeat enemies.

                                                                  

Gameplay

  • Slide, jump, boost and flip your way to the end of a level as fast as you can for bonus coins. 
  • Use puddles to plow into enemies with your puddle shield
  • Preform a flip to attack enemies or extend your jump distance or break a fall
  • hydroplane on the surface of water at high speeds
  • Playtime: 1hour+

Controls

  • Movement: WASD or Dpad/left thumbstick
  • Action(boost,hydroplane): left arrow key or X button
  • Jump : Up arrow key or A button
  • Pause: P key or Start button
  • Flip attack: Hold up and press the action button
  • Boost slide: Hold down and press the action button
  • Fullscreen shortcut: F key, also found on pause menu screen (P)

                                                                         

Features

  • Dolphin capable of moving on land
  • Puddles that boost you and form a bubble shield
  • 4 bosses
  • 20+ levels
  • keyboard and controller support
  • Beachball minigames
  • Giant death saw
